Name: malignant Leydig cell tumor
Definition: A sex cord-gonadal stromal tumor that secretes testosterone characterized by excessive proliferation of Leydig cells located_in ovary or testicle.

Name: malignant Sertoli cell tumor
Definition: A sex cord-gonadal stromal tumor characterized by excessive proliferation of Sertoli cells located_in the seminiferous tubules of the testicles.

Name: malignant Sertoli-Leydig cell tumor
Definition: A sex cord-gonadal stromal tumor characterized by variable proportions of Sertoli cells

Name: ovarian sex-cord stromal tumor
Definition: A sex cord-gonadal stromal tumor that arises from the ovary and is composed of granulosa cells
